title: <name your workshop>
lead: <one sentence elevator pitch of the workshop>
learn: <comma-separated list of topics that will be covered>
audience: <comma-separated list of recommended audience. examples follow:>
CISOs and VPs of Information Security
author: <your first and last name>

buttons.name: <name button (e.g. PowerPoint) NOTE: buttons are OPTIONAL. You can even add multiple buttons if you'd like.  If you do no want additional buttons, then remove the 'buttons': [...] section and the comma at the end of the line above buttons. >
buttons.icon: <font-awesome icon class for button. refer to http://fontawesome.io/icons/ and search for icon, then copy/paste class here. (e.g. fa-file-powerpoint-o)>
